episodes.content: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news and video releases!
episodes.description: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, two dance-and-vocal groups: FANTASTICS from EXILE TRIBE and SUPER DRAGON. They're both generating a buzz, and they're both coming to chat and perform.

episodes.content: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news and video releases!
episodes.description: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Miyano Mamoru (a voice actor and a hugely popular singer) and JO1 (an 11-member all-male group who've been generating a buzz since their debut this year).
episodes.subtitle: Miyano Mamoru and JO1

episodes.content: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news and video releases!
episodes.description: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, enka singer Sakamoto Fuyumi, female idol group Morning Musume.'20, and male dance-and-vocal group Bullet Train are coming to chat and perform.

episodes.content: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news and video releases!
episodes.description: Join May J. for great Japanese music! In the studio this week: singer-songwriter Miyazawa Kazufumi, five-piece all-female hard-rock band BAND-MAID, and six-piece idol group Cho Tokimeki Sendenbu.
episodes.subtitle: Miyazawa Kazufumi, BAND-MAID, and Cho Tokimeki Sendenbu
